name: school-rest-api
description: REST application for school management system

scripts.build: babel server.js config.js log.js src --out-dir build --extensions ".ts,.js,.html" --copy-files
scripts.start:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node build/server.js
scripts.production: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && node build/server.js

author: Y3S2_REG_WE_14
